title: Dumbarton Oaks and Bretton Woods MCQ 1

content.question: Which of the following best describes a main idea common to both passages?

choices.label: The new organizations should solve international humanitarian problems.
The new organizations should facilitate greater international cooperation.
The new organizations should address political and economic inequalities among member states.
The new organizations should promote democracy and free-trade across the world.

content.answer: The new organizations should facilitate greater international cooperation.

topic.text: 9.8: Institutions Developing in a Globalized World

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
